mapper.select: select HW_MODEL.JSON as json,HW_MODEL.NAME as name,HW_MODEL.NT as nt,HW_MODEL.ID as token from HW_MODEL
select HW_MODEL.JSON as json,HW_MODEL.NAME as name,HW_MODEL.NT as nt,HW_MODEL.ID as token from HW_MODEL
select HW_MODEL.JSON as json,HW_MODEL.NAME as name,HW_MODEL.NT as nt,HW_MODEL.ID as token from HW_MODEL
select HW_MODEL.JSON as json,HW_MODEL.NAME as name,HW_MODEL.NT as nt,HW_MODEL.ID as token from HW_MODEL WHERE HW_MODEL.ID = #{token}
select HW_MODEL.JSON as json,HW_MODEL.NAME as name,HW_MODEL.NT as nt,HW_MODEL.ID as token from HW_MODEL WHERE HW_MODEL.ID = #{token}
